page.title: 11A DAY IN PRIDDY
page.content: When I wake up, I can usually hear a tractor at work somewhere because there are 3 farms actually in the village itself. Opening the window I hear the birds singing and the cock crowing. After breakfast, I take the dog for a walk around the Top Green and pass by our neighbours house where Mrs Finlayson is usually making breakfast. On my way back, I see Mr Main, one of the local farmers driving his cattle up the road and into the field. After everyone has gone to work or school the village is peaceful. My mum goes to work for our landlord,Mrs Garvin. After school there is not much to do so after my tea, I go and see my friends before going to bed.
